hanzi-su-wiki:
啓

Значения

Открывать, понимать, поучать; просвещать, сообщать

Мнемоника

Вход в комнату императрицы разрешён только после стука 攵 в дверь 戸 и сообщения 口 о цели визита.

Варианты

启, 啟
purpleculture_pinyin:
qǐ
variant of 启
вариант Кая
rtega_mnemonic:
啓啓RS
启启		open, begin, commence, explain, say, disclose
  • RS. the door 户 being opened with the hand 攵 thus there is light and things can be explained 口
  • hand pushing open 攵 the door 户 of the mouth 口
purpleculture_info: Ideographic: To knock 攵 at the door 户
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • ⿰ Left to right
      • 户 [ hù ] door; family
      • 攵 [ pū ] to rap, to tap; script; to let go
    • 口 [ kǒu ] mouth; entrance, gate, opening
heisig_chinese_memo: Behind closed doors, the taskmaster and his mouth are more personable and disclose information that enlightens you about his way of thinking.
heisig_constituent: disclose, bouncer, door, one, ceiling, flag, taskmaster, mouth
koohiiStory1: Behind closed DOORS, the TASKMASTER tortures to get prisoners to open their MOUTHS and DISCLOSE information.
koohiiStory2: You signed a non-disclosure agreement with the taskmaster but you opened your mouth as soon as you got out the door!
jp_example_words: 拝啓(はいけい): Dear (so and so)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: If you can find the door in winter shaped like a mouth it will enlighten you.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine searching for this special door in the cold wind and snow of winter. The search for enlightenment always has something to do with suffering and searching on your own like this.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: The door enlightened you by opening up and revealing the cake (けい) in its door-mouth. "Cake is the key to enlightenment, my child. Now eat it from my mouth."
WaniKani_Reading_Info: All you need to do to attain enlightenment is to eat this cake... out of this mouth. Eh. Maybe enlightenment isn't worth it.
Ru_Radicals: 一 (один), 口 (рот), 尸 (труп), 戸 (дверь), 攵 (складной стул)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the mouth (口) strikes (攵) the door (戸), he discloses
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Behind closed doors, the taskmaster and his mouth are more personable and disclose information that enlightens you about his way of thinking.

啓字的基本解释

啓
qǐ
见“启”。

啓字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qǐ］
［《廣韻》康禮切，上薺，溪。］
“唘1”的今字。“啔1”的今字。亦作“啟1”。亦作“闙1”。
(1)开；打开。
(2)分开。
(3)开拓；开创。
(4)通；开通。
(5)开导；启发。
(6)指门户；道桥。参见“啓塞”。
(7)古时指立春、立夏。
(8)始；开始。
(9)招致；引发。
(10)启奏；禀告。
(11)泛指奏疏，公文，书函。
(12)先锋。
(13)引申指先进的，前头的。
(14)指军队的左翼。
(15)跪；危坐。
(16)视。后作“”。
(17)马之一种，称前右足白者。
(18)姓。

啓字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　啓； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页195第17
【廣韻】康禮切【集韻】【韻會】遣禮切【正韻】祛禮切，?音棨。【說文】本作啓，教也。【玉篇】開發也。【書·堯典】啓明。【傳】啓，開也。又【大甲】啓廸後人。　又【爾雅·釋言】啓，跪也。【註】跽也。【詩·小雅】不遑啓處。【傳】啓，跪。處，居也。　又【廣韻】別也。又刻也。　又【詩·小雅】元戎十乗，以先啓行。【註】王氏曰：軍前曰啓，後曰殿。先軍行之前者，所謂選鋒也。　又啓事。【晉書·山濤傳】濤爲吏部尚書，凡用人行政，皆先密啓，然後公奏，舉無失才。時稱山公啓事。　又【字彙】姓也。　又【爾雅·釋畜】前右足白，啓。【註】左傳曰啓服。【疏】昭二十九年，衞侯來獻其乗馬，曰啓服。杜預曰：啓服，馬名是也。　又【埤雅】雨而晝晴曰啓。　又星名。【詩·小雅】東有啓明。　又與启通。詳前启字註。

考證：〔【爾雅·釋畜】【註】左傳曰，啓服。【疏】昭二十八年，〕　謹照原二十八年改二十九年。

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [qǐ]
["Guangyun" Kang Liqie, upper water chestnut, stream. ]
The present character of "唘1". The present character of "啔1". Also known as "Revelation 1". Also known as "Qui 1".
(1) Open; open.
(2) Separate.
(3) Pioneering; pioneering.
(4) Open; open.
(5) Enlighten; enlighten.
(6) Refers to the portal; Daoqiao. See "opening".
(7) In ancient times, it referred to Lichun and Lixia.
(8) Begin; begin.
(9) Incurred; triggered.
(10) Initiation; report.
(11) Refers to memorials, official documents, and letters in general.
(12) Pioneer.
(13) The extension refers to the advanced and the first.
(14) Refers to the left wing of the army.
(15) Kneel; sit in danger.
(16) Depending on. It is later called "".
(17) A kind of horse, which is called white front right foot.
(18) Last name.

Name meaning

qǐ
вм. 启
Radicals: 戸, 夂, 口  (door, winter, mouth)
Meaning Mnemonic
If you can find the door in winter shaped like a mouth it will enlighten you.
Imagine searching for this special door in the cold wind and snow of winter. The search for enlightenment always has something to do with suffering and searching on your own like this.
Reading Mnemonic
The door enlightened you by opening up and revealing the cake (けい) in its door-mouth. "Cake is the key to enlightenment, my child. Now eat it from my mouth."
All you need to do to attain enlightenment is to eat this cake... out of this mouth. Eh. Maybe enlightenment isn't worth it.
